"Shirayuki": "You're the ARKS from Aelio, right? I've heard rumors about you."
"I should like to see that skill for myself. I'll be looking forward to it."
"Mm, it's you. Come to think of it, we've yet to be introduced."
"I'm Shirayuki. I serve this Stia regiment as Commander of the 3rd Combat Platoon."
"If it's alright with you, I would like to put your strength to the test."
"Go and show me what you've got. Good luck."
"Mm, it's you. If it's alright with you, I want you to show me how you fight for a second time."
"You have two targets: a \"Volt Remnus\" and a \"Dark Remnus\"."
"They can be found in Stia's Fringes and Outer Mediola: Sector 2 respectively."
"Now, go and give it a try. Good luck out there."
